channel.title: All Posts on Mindful Queries
channel.description: Recent content in All Posts on Mindful Queries

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What would I choose to add back to my life if all my obligations vanished overnight?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: How would my daily routine change if I focused more on my strengths and less on my weaknesses?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Are my inputs satisfying the results I desire?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What would I do today if I wanted to maximize peace of mind?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Do I have the courage to start a new project that might not work?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What actions can I take that would force me to fully commit to a path Iâ€™ve been thinking about for a while?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Given the reality of where I am right now, what is the best next action?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Am I doing what is required or am I looking for a shortcut?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What’s the most fun I could possibly have in one year?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Do I have the skills to respond rather than react?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: If I knew I wouldn’t fail, what would I attempt to do?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Do I need more information or more courage?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Do the outcomes I anticipate correspond to the daily routines I stick to?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Do I need to be doing more observing or more participating?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Is it better to ask, what should I attempt next, instead of, will it succeed?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: When was a time when I was satisfied with my “time well spent”?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What small but significant action can I take today?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What is something I can remember but can no longer experience?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What is something amazing about my life that I rarely appreciate as much as I should?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Am I willing to risk my own comfort in a way that will benefit others?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What am I continuing to do out of habit, but is no longer serving me?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Am I able to shift some of my time and energy on the chronic problems instead of the urgent ones?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Where do I go for courage?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: When I fail, am I failing forward?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: If I knew one thing would be guaranteed to work out in the new year, what would I want that to be?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: How do I hold on to that feeling of goodwill?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Am I pausing before my next task?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Am I creating the right boundaries?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What invisible enemy in my life am I ignoring?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What current inaction will require radical action in the future to compensate?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Am I making time to feel awe?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Are there any ideas I should unlearn?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What is something I love doing that keeping track of time never comes to mind?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Are the inputs in my life creating outputs that align with my values?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Am I optimizing for the outcome or the process?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: How many things am I leaving undetected that will become too late for action later on?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Is my success pushing me away from the fundamental thing that led me to succeed?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Will doing this cause more freedom or less freedom?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What can I learn from a period in my life where I was most engaged and energetic?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What would a letter written to my future self say?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Am I reacting or responding to this thing?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Am I doing this activity because I’m bored or excited?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What would I need to see or learn to change my mind about something?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: To accomplish this thing, will it require action or inaction?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What are the consequences for a belief I have?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What identity do I want to have a year from now?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Is this serving me or is it detrimental to my well-being?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Is there a lost skill I once had that can be useful for me now?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Is the solution removing my attention from the actual problem?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Am I waiting for ‘X’ to happen before I can be happy?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Am I delaying action in hope of avoiding some degree of suffering?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What am I avoiding or clinging on to that is causing pain?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Is there someone who can help me see this problem in a different way?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Am I able to turn any unknown unknowns into known unknowns?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What would be the antidote to a fear I have?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: Is the task I’m thinking of doing next truly necessary?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What have I been doing by default settings that could use a new approach?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What must I unlearn to understand something better?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What small thing am I doing each day that could lead to a large problem later in life?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What can present me do today that future me would appreciate?

item.title: Query of the Day
item.description: What can I eliminate to make room for the things I do enjoy?
